curam.util.resources
Interface EnvironmentConstants.Test

Enclosing interface:
EnvironmentConstants
public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Test

These settings configure those elements of Curam which are useful for Unit Testing. None of these settings should be used in a deployed application as they will either degrade performance or cause failures.

Field Summary

Field Detail

kOverrideDate

static final java.lang.String kOverrideDate
This property allows the date and time to be set to a known value for testing. In order to override the date and time the property should be in the format YYYYMMDDThhmmss. The 'T' character is the separator between the date and the time. It is valid to only specify the date. If the time portion of the property is not explicitly set the time will be automatically default to midnight (00:00:00). For example, the string value 20070101T175930 represents 17:59:30 on 1st January 2007. The string value 20070101 represents 00:00:00 on 1st January 2007. Property name : curam.test.override.date

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kReadMultiMaxAsError

static final java.lang.String kReadMultiMaxAsError
Default: false. Specifies that a run time error should be thrown as well as a log message when the result size of Readmulti operation exceeds the maximum. This does not apply when the Treat readmulti-max as InformationalException option is enabled Property name : curam.test.treatreadmultimaxaserror

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kStoreEntityKeys

static final java.lang.String kStoreEntityKeys
Default: false. Specifies that the values written to the database should be stored in memory for retrieval by tests. They can be accessed through curam.util.DataAccess.KeyRepository. Property name : curam.test.store.entitykeys

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kStatisticTracing

static final java.lang.String kStatisticTracing
Default: false. Place a compact trace of BO method invocations in a buffered log. This representation is suitable for obtaining performance measurements. Property name : curam.test.trace.statistics

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kStatisticLocation

static final java.lang.String kStatisticLocation
The name of the file which will have the statistics information generated into it. Property name : curam.test.trace.statistics.location

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kSingleUserEnvironment

static final java.lang.String kSingleUserEnvironment
Indicates whether only a single user will be active. This is the only mode supported if an IDE is used to execute Curam as a standalone Java program. Property name : curam.test.singleuser

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kStubDeferredProcess

static final java.lang.String kStubDeferredProcess
Default: false. Specifies that it needs to use deferred processing without en-queuing in App Server. Property name : curam.test.stubdeferredprocessing

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kStubDeferredProcessInSameTransaction

static final java.lang.String kStubDeferredProcessInSameTransaction
Default: false. Specifies that stubbed deferred process calls should be run in the current transaction using the current database connection. If true, a new transaction will not be started for each stubbed deferred process call. Property name : curam.test.stubdeferredprocessinsametransaction

See Also:
Constant Field Values
